main event: A civilian reported observing a flat and oblong object with flashing red, green, and white lights moving in a zigzag pattern to the west.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 12 July 1955., The object was observed for half a minute., There was an aircraft in the area at the time of the sighting., The object was reported as possibly being a balloon or aircraft but insufficient data was available for a definitive conclusion., The observation was made from the ground.
sighted object: a flat and oblong object with flashing lights
